english.segment1: Put your hands up open up wide. Put your hands up side by side. Age dont matter like. Race dont matter like. Place dont matter like whats inside
english.segment2: Let the kick drum kick one time. Breathe out let your mind unwind. Eyes on the ceiling. Looking for the feeling. Wide open let your own eyes shine
english.segment3: Yeah, its where the fight begins. Yeah, underneath the skin. Between these hopes and where weve been. Every fight comes from the fight within
english.segment4: - Chorus . I am the war inside. I am the battle line. I am the rising tide. I am the war I fight
english.segment5: Eyes open open wide. I can feel it like a crack in my spine. I can feel it like the back of my mind. I am the war inside
english.segment6: I get the feeling that were living in sci-fi. I get the the feeling that our weapons are lo-fi. Aint no killer like pride. No killer like I. No killer like whats inside
english.segment7: Yeah, its in the air we breathe. Yeah, its in the blood we bleed. Beneath these dreams and what weve seen. We are the kids of the in-between
english.segment8: Put your hands up open up wide. put your hands up side by side. Age dont matter like. Race dont matter like. Place dont matter like whats inside
english.segment9: Yeah, every thought or deed. Yeah, every tree or seed. The big things come from the little dreams. Every world is made by make believe
